name: Afterlife (itch) (Hyeson)
description:
"Afterlife" is a business simulation game with beautiful photorealistic hand-painted graphics, exciting music and unexpected twists. It contains rage, shooting and death. Lots of death. It is different from what you used to know.
Meet relatives of famous people, unlock achievements and show the world that you know how to make business!

The game was made for a development contest and developed within routhly 2 weeks.
